snippet.title: Ereban Shadow Legacy - Developer Presentation - Future Games Show Gamescom 2022
snippet.description: Ereban Shadow Legacy is a stealth platformer from Baby Robot Games, and the developers revealed some sleek gameplay at the Future Games Show at Gamescom 2022. Ereban Shadow Legacy is coming to PC and Xbox in 2023.
